citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:55 am on
18-Jun-19.
The inspector arrived at the facility at 11:55am and spoke to a household member who stated that no one was
available for the inspection. The inspector then left the facility.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:55 am on
18-Jun-19.
The inspector arrived at the facility at 11:55am and spoke to a household member who stated that no one was
available for the inspection.  The inspector then left the facility.
